section.title: About idnadrev
section.para: Project idnadrev is a task, information and life management system aimed for personal use. There will be a PC(java) and a feature reduced mobile(android) version. The PC version will also act as a server for the mobile version. As for task management it follows common principles similar to GTD. So the user can collect any information, documents, media whatever... This stuff can be processed/reviewed in order to create tasks/projects orknowledge. A knowledge item can be linked to tasks but can also exist standalone. Tags and Categories help you to find your relevant knowledge items. The emotion tracking system(if activated) will help you to identify what kind of task(work, leisure, sports etc.) makes you feel good or bad and help/suggest the next best task for your current mood. The food planner will help you to keep track of your daily calorie consumption and nutrition. It will provide you with a shopping list and your own recipes. The money tracker will help you to keep track of the amount of money you spend as well as help you with saving up money for bigger projects. A vocabulary trainer will help you to learn your favourite languages or just to train your brain in remembering things. For each feature there will be predefined reports helping you to analyse yourself.

section.title: Information/Thought
section.para:
You can collect anything you want which might be a future task, project, or a knowledge item.
After collecting those information you can process them and transfer them into tasks or knowledge items.
You can of course always create knowledge items or tasks immediately.

section.title: Task
section.para: A task is the central item of idnadrev. It can be a child of another task which makes its parent to a project. It can be recurring, scheduled, delegated, the typical stuff. They can be grouped by location and topic. There is a time tracking method that gives you feedback on the time estimated and spend. This time tracking can also be adjusted to give you a custom break timetable.

section.title: Knowledge
section.para: A knowledge item is quite widespread. It basically exists of text combined with files. You can mark a knowledge item with tags and categories for easier finding.

section.title: Tags and Categories
section.para: You can define tree-formed categories and give tags to your knowledge items for easier finding via browsing and searching.
